name: The Tale of Clouds
description:
The Tale of Clouds is an adventure platformer, with more than 400 items to collect! (Not in-game yet though)

Legends say that once a blue moon a special sheep is born. These sheep are born with a jetpack! And this year one of them is old enough to start an epic adventure to realise his dream, to become a cloud.

Play as Clouds, the playful young sheep who tries to reach the speed of light to become a cloud. (Because that is how physics work!) But on his mighty quest he meets a lot of evil, but thanks to all his new friends he has a chance to fight and train to realise his dream.

Stalk us on:

Facebook: www.facebook.com/Beast Inc.

Twitter: www.twitter.com/Beast_Inc

Youtube: www.youtube.com/Beast Inc

Google Play Store: Soon!

Google+: plus.google.com/Beast Inc

Turtle Simulator is a awsome game, created for Android devices. Early money-Döners get early access to this marvelous application, if they are supportive enough. But this game will be available for free at the Google Play Store once we reach $25, raised by the Döners. (We need that money to gain access to upload software to the Google Play Store.)
